solution_line_template: He made $300 selling sunglasses because {pairs_sold} x {selling_price_per_pair} = <<{pairs_sold}*{selling_price_per_pair}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue}
His costs for the sunglasses were $260 because {total_revenue} - {total_profits} = <<{total_revenue}-{total_profits}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
The sunglasses cost him $26 each because {total_cost} / {pairs_sold} = <<{total_cost}/{pairs_sold}={cost_per_pair}>>{cost_per_pair}
